# General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>

## Announcement

### Issuance of Tender No. (29 - 2024 / 2025)

**Subject: Technical Support and Preventive Maintenance for Fire Alarm and Firefighting Systems at Kuwait International Airport <orig>مطار الكويت الدولي</orig> and the facilities of the Directorate General of Civil Aviation <orig>الإدارة العامة للطيران المدني</orig>**

The Directorate General of Civil Aviation <orig>الإدارة العامة للطيران المدني</orig> announces the issuance of Tender No. (29-2024/2025) for technical support and preventive maintenance for fire alarm and firefighting systems at Kuwait International Airport <orig>مطار الكويت الدولي</orig> and the facilities of the Directorate General of Civil Aviation <orig>الإدارة العامة للطيران المدني</orig>, in accordance with the terms and specifications mentioned in the tender documents. Government entities must schedule an appointment in compliance with the decisions of the esteemed Council of Ministers <orig>مجلس الوزراء الموقر</orig>. The documents can be obtained from the Financial Affairs Department <orig>إدارة الشئون المالية</orig> – Tenders and Contracts Section <orig>قسم المناقصات والعقود</orig> at the Directorate General of Civil Aviation <orig>الإدارة العامة للطيران المدني</orig> starting from Sunday, 26/01/2025, during official working hours, for a fee of (75 K.D.) only seventy-five Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, non-refundable, with payment to be made via (K.net).

A preliminary meeting will be held at the headquarters of the Directorate General of Civil Aviation <orig>الإدارة العامة للطيران المدني</orig> on Tuesday, 04/02/2025, at 11:00 AM, on the condition that the original purchase receipt is presented upon attendance. Only one person per company residency may attend.

The documents shall be returned after being completed, with the required documents enclosed, along with a preliminary bid bond of not less than (2%) of the bid value, in the form of a certified check or a letter of guarantee issued by an accredited bank in the State of Kuwait. The bond must be issued in the name of the bidder and for the benefit of the Directorate General of Civil Aviation <orig>الإدارة العامة للطيران المدني</orig>, and must be unconditional. Bids not accompanied by this bond will not be considered, even if they conform to the specifications. The bond must be valid for the required bid validity period. The documents shall be submitted in a sealed official envelope with a red wax seal and delivered to the (Tenders and Contracts Section <orig>قسم المناقصات والعقود</orig>) at the Directorate General of Civil Aviation <orig>الإدارة العامة للطيران المدني</orig>.

Please note that the deadline for submitting bids is 1:00 PM on Wednesday, 12/02/2025. Any bid submitted after this deadline will be rejected.

Acting Deputy Director General for Administrative and Financial Affairs <orig>نائب المدير العام للشؤون الإدارية والمالية بالتكليف</orig>

# General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>

## Announcement

### Regarding the Issuance of Tender No. (15-2024-2025)

The General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig> announces the issuance of Tender No. (15-2024-2025) concerning the maintenance, supply, and installation of restrooms at the headquarters of the General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>, in accordance with the special and general specifications and conditions contained in the tender documents. These documents can be obtained from the headquarters of the General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>, Dasma area <orig>منطقة الدسمة</orig> / Block 6, Hamoud Al-Ruqayya Street, Second Floor – Finance Department <orig>الإدارة المالية</orig> – Procurement Section <orig>قسم المشتريات</orig> – during official working hours for a non-refundable fee of (75 K.D.), starting from Sunday, 26/01/2025. Bids must be submitted to the General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig> before 1:00 PM on Thursday, 06/02/2025.

A preliminary meeting with the companies will be held at the headquarters of the General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig> on Sunday, 02/02/2025, at 12:00 PM.

The preliminary bid bond for this tender is (2%) of the bid value and must be valid for the entire duration of the bid's validity.

Those wishing to obtain the terms and conditions booklet are requested to bring the following documents:
- A copy of the application for registration in the Secretariat's supplier registry.
- A copy of the Commercial Register certificate.
- A copy of the registration certificate from the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig>.
- A copy of the national labor support certificate.

## Announcement
### Regarding Tender No. (19-2024-2025)

The General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig> announces the issuance of Tender No. (19-2024-2025) concerning the supply and installation of office furniture and curtains at the headquarters of the General Secretariat of Awqaf, in accordance with the special and general specifications and conditions contained in the tender documents. These documents can be obtained from the headquarters of the General Secretariat of Awqaf, Dasma <orig>الدسمة</orig> area / Block 6, Hamoud Al-Raqaba <orig>حمود الرقبة</orig> Street, Second Floor – Financial Administration – Procurement Department – during official working hours for a non-refundable fee of (75 K.D. <orig>د.ك</orig>), starting from Sunday, 26/1/2025. Bids must be submitted to the General Secretariat of Awqaf before one o'clock in the afternoon on Thursday, 6/2/2025.

A preliminary meeting with the companies will be held at the headquarters of the General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig> on Sunday, 2/2/2025, at exactly 11:30 AM.
The initial bid bond for this tender is (2%) of the bid value and must be valid for the entire duration of the bid's validity.

Those wishing to obtain the booklet of conditions are requested to bring the following documents:
- A copy of the application for registration in the Secretariat's supplier register.
- A copy of the commercial registration certificate.
- A copy of the registration certificate from the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
- A copy of the national labor support certificate.

General Secretariat of Awqaf <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>

Based on Article (19) of the Municipality's Decision No. (161/2009) concerning the classification, licensing, and registration of construction and demolition contractors in the Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig>, which stipulates that a contractor may submit a request to the Municipality to cancel their registration before its expiration or to cancel their classification, and the committee stipulated in the first article of these regulations may issue its decision to that effect after the fulfillment of the following two conditions:
1- The contractor has completed all contracted works.
2- The lapse of (15) fifteen days from the date of publishing this request in the Official Gazette.
The cancellation of the license or registration shall result in the return of the bank guarantee submitted by the contractor, taking into account the last paragraph of Article (10) of this decision.
Accordingly, the Municipality appeals to anyone with any claims against the aforementioned contractor regarding construction contracts concluded between them that have not yet been completed, or judicial attachments in their favor due to non-compliant contracting works or dues arising from the contract, to contact the Contractors Section at the Engineering Systems Department within a maximum period of fifteen days from this date. The Municipality will not consider any claims submitted after the specified period.

Director General of the Municipality <orig>مدير عام البلدية</orig>

# Kuwait Institute for Scientific Research <orig>معهد الكويت للأبحاث العلمية</orig>
## Auction Announcement
The Kuwait Institute for Scientific Research <orig>معهد الكويت للأبحاث العلمية</orig> announces the issuance of Auction No. 8-2024/2025 for the utilization of the Institute's cafeterias at the (Shuwaikh <orig>الشويخ</orig> – Salmiya <orig>السالمية</orig> – Ahmadi <orig>الأحمدي</orig>) locations for a period of 3 years.
Those wishing to participate must pay a fee of KWD 20/- (only twenty Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>) to the cashier and obtain the practice documents from the Institute's website: www.kisr.edu.kw
The deadline for submitting bids (at the Purchasing and Warehousing Department / Third Floor / Main Building) is 12:00 PM on Monday, 17/02/2025.

<table_caption>Auction Schedule for KISR Cafeteria</table_caption>
<table>
| Notes | Document Price | Closing Date | Issuance Date |
|---|---|---|---|
| A preliminary meeting and site visit will be held on Sunday, 02/02/2025, at 10:00 AM. Inquiries should be sent to the email address: Asayed@kisr.edu.kw | KWD 20 | 17/02/2025 | 26/01/2025 |
</table>

* The auction is limited to specialized companies registered with the Institute and to small and medium enterprises.
* Experience of no less than 5 years in the same field is required.
* A "To Whom It May Concern" certificate stating that the company's file is not suspended from government contracts.
* Please provide the Institute with all company documents: (Signature Authorization – National Labor Percentage Certificate – Company's Articles of Association).
* The auction is non-divisible.

## Extension

The Public Utilities Management Company <orig>شركة إدارة المرافق العمومية</orig> announces the extension of Tender No. (01/A.M.A/2025) concerning the construction, completion, and maintenance of the surface Citizen Parking Service Center in the Mirqab area of Kuwait City.
This will be effective from Sunday, 05/01/2025, in accordance with the general, special, and technical terms and specifications contained in the tender documents. These documents can be obtained from the company's headquarters located at (Kuwait – Al-Ma'arri St. off Arabian Gulf St. – Al-Ahmadiyya Multi-Story Car Park – Fourth Floor), for a non-refundable fee of (150 K.D.) only one hundred and fifty Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>.
The documents must be returned after being completed and stamped, with the required documents and a preliminary guarantee of (2,000 K.D.) only two thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> enclosed, in the form of a certified check or a bank letter of guarantee of the same value. Bids not accompanied by this guarantee will not be considered, even if they conform to the specifications. The documents must be submitted in an official envelope, sealed with red wax, and placed in the company's box by the specified deadline.
Please note that the deadline for submitting bids is Thursday, 06/02/2025, at twelve o'clock noon.
A preliminary meeting will be held on Thursday, 23/01/2025, at ten o'clock in the morning at the company's headquarters.
This tender is limited to companies and establishments specialized in these works. The company/establishment's papers and documents (articles of incorporation, license, signature authorizations, etc.), including previous experience for the last five years in the same field, must be submitted with the bid in accordance with the requirements mentioned in the general conditions of the tender. Proof of compliance with the National Labor Support Law must also be provided.

Secretary

# Announcement

# Extension
The Public Utilities Management Company <orig>شركة إدارة المرافق العمومية</orig> announces the extension of Public Tender No. (13/P.U.M./2024/12) regarding the study, design, detailed plans, licensing, preparation of tender documents, and supervision of the works for a wastewater treatment plant in the Expatriate Labor City in Al-Shadadiya <orig>الشدادية</orig>. The tender was issued starting from Sunday, 01/12/2024, in accordance with the general, special, and technical terms and specifications contained in the tender documents. The tender documents can be obtained from the company's headquarters located at (Kuwait - Al-Ma'arri St. off Arabian Gulf St. - Al-Ahmadiya Multi-Story Car Park - Fourth Floor), for a non-refundable fee of (250 K.D.) (only two hundred and fifty Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>ديناراً كويتياً</orig>).
The tender has been extended, and the deadline for submitting bids will be Thursday, 06/02/2025, at 1:00 PM.
Please note that a preliminary meeting was held on Monday, 09/12/2024, at 10:00 AM at the company's headquarters.
Bids are to be placed in the company's tender box. The initial guarantee is (5,000 K.D.) (only five thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>) in the form of a certified check or a bank guarantee of the same value.
This tender is limited to specialized engineering and consulting offices and firms in this field, and the office/firm's documents must be submitted (a copy of a valid office license - a copy of the registration certificate with the Union of Engineering Offices and Consulting Firms...). Proof of compliance with the National Labor Support Law must be submitted, including previous experience, when submitting the bid, in accordance with the following requirements, which will be the basis for the technical evaluation:
- Must have a track record of three similar projects including the design and supervision of the implementation of wastewater treatment plants and irrigation networks.
- The consulting office must have a local or international partner as a specialized designer in this field (design and supervision of the implementation of wastewater treatment plants).
- Submission of a preliminary design for the wastewater treatment plan, illustrating all stages with a brief explanation.
- Must have a technical engineering staff of design engineers for (architectural, civil, electrical, and mechanical) works with no less than ten years of experience in designing and supervising similar projects.
- Must have a valid registration with the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>لجنة المناقصات المركزية</orig>.
For inquiries and clarifications, please send an email to real.estate@pumc.com.kw from the date of the tender issuance until Sunday, 19/12/2024, at the latest.

The documents shall be returned after being filled out and stamped, with the required documents and an initial guarantee of (5,000 K.D.), only five thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, enclosed in the form of a certified check or a bank guarantee of the same value. Bids not accompanied by this guarantee will not be considered, even if they conform to the specifications.
